Source code for src.umd_vision.image.transformations

#!/usr/bin/env python2
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-



[docs]def horizontal_cut(image, percentage):
    height = image.shape[0]
    center = height / 2
    bottom = int(center + (height * percentage))
    top = int(center - (height * percentage))
    image = image[top:bottom, :]
    return image
